summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2444, for the improvement of the alley in block 37, Capitol Hill Addition, Division NO. 5, being the alley from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive, and between 20th Avenue North and 21st Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt or some other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with necessary grading and the construction of a sewer with appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 26226and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
